	{
	   
	    "group" : "Performance on Core Competency",
	    "criteria" : "Technical Skills",
	    "weightage" : 35.0,
	    "elements" : [{"rating": "Outstanding", "description": "Possess complete knowledge of all aspects of core skill, indepth understanding of system architechture, demonstrates deep business understanding across industries"},
	{"rating": "Exceeds Expectation", "description": "Proficient in his respective application / module and is able to exhibit knowledge of all the functionaltiies. Also demonstrate the experience by means of recommending appropirate workaround to meet business needs"},
	{"rating": "Meets + Expectation", "description": "Carries good knwoledge and application setup experience for most of the fucntions of his core skill. Is able to drive the process discussion & system setup on his / her own"},
	{"rating": "Meets  Expectation", "description": "Has reasonable understanding of core application skill in terms of system functionality and able to work on detailed requirements described by customer with limited support from others. "},
	{"rating": "Meets Partial Expectations", "description": "Has basic understanding & thoerotical knowledge of the core module and its business application. Can work under the instructions from senior expert"},
	{"rating": "Needs Improvement", "description": "Has basic understanding & thoerotical knowledge of the core module and its business application. Finds challenging  to work even with support  from senior expert"}]
	},
	
	{
	    
	    "group" : "Performance on Core Competency",
	    "criteria" : "Cross Skill Expertise",
	    "weightage" : 2.5,
	    "elements" : [{"rating": "Outstanding", "description": "Has command on more than 2 core skills and demonstrate high level of expertise in both. Also has complete undertsanding of end to end SCM processes in SAP. "},
	{"rating": "Exceeds Expectation", "description": "Has build upon a secondary skill where the individual can work on a customer project with limited or no support from others. Posseses good knowledge on end-to-end SCM processes"},
	{"rating": "Meets + Expectation", "description": "Has good understanding of overall processes in SCM and is able to provide high level guidence to customer on non-core skills. Upto date with the new modules released by SAP"},
	{"rating": "Meets  Expectation", "description": "Has attended the basic presentations on all procesees in supply chain and has conceptual understanding of at least one additional module for basic functionalties"},
	{"rating": "Meets Partial Expectations", "description": "Has got knwoledge of high level features and processes offered by at leats one other SAP supply chain module"},
	{"rating": "Needs Improvement", "description": "Has  less/no understanding  knowledge of high level features and processes offered by  other SAP supply chain module"}]
	},
	
	
	
	{
	    
	    "group" : "Performance on Core Competency",
	    "criteria" : "Initiative /  Innovation",

	{"rating": "Exceeds Expectation", "description": "Come up with the ideas of creating accelerators and is been able to build couple of them. Ensure extraction of value add / unique solutions from projects that can be reused"},
	{"rating": "Meets + Expectation", "description": "Has assesed industry requirements and white spaces in SAP application and proposed a solution that can meet customer expetcations. Involved in building at least one reusable"},
	{"rating": "Meets  Expectation", "description": "Come up with the ideas of building unique solution that differentiate us from competition. Provide good input to management to take it up for development"},
	{"rating": "Meets Partial Expectations", "description": "Able to understand the gaps in standard solution and propose alternate solution. "},
	{"rating": "Needs Improvement", "description": "unable to understand the gaps in standard solution and propose alternate solution. "}]
